description:
Hey troops,

We're back with a special treat for you in the War Chest Update tonight and this one is a whole side of beef for those of you who like your men on the meaty side (in more ways what one). Randy, who comes to us from guest-director Mike, is an even 6 foot and weighs in at a muscle bound 200lbs. He's originally from North Carolina (go fellow Tarheel, hell yeah!)

Randy enjoys playing hockey, going to the gym (of course) and hunting and fishing. Mike gets him all prepped so he can leave him alone for a little bit to see what Randy can work up. Not one to show what he's working with too fast, Randy plays with his dick through his boxers for a bit while he works it up before the big reveal.

Enjoy your alone time with this hot beefy soldier as we ponder the question: Will Mike get him back for more?
title: Randy
